title: What font type?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317090250im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ks-logo-black2_4235.png)

What font type or name did they use to render this image?
author: robertpeter07

comments.content:
You've posted to the wrong part of the forum. Type ID requests are made here:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317090250/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

The typeface is called Shango, and is based on Schneidler-Mediaeval mit Initialen, designed by F.H. Ernst Schneidler in 1936:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317090250/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/")
